column5: 24 hours till wet sock season Hopes it be likes last year,me need some gorrillas
Hope you have a good season Marc.
Hope your socks get very wet this season Marc!
Go get a soaker  Good luck Marc!  Joey
I'd say good luck, but something tells me you wont need it.  Have a great time out there!!!

Thanks you everyone too those that go Ccmt,I always need luck cause having  hope,well lets just say hope in one hand and shiite in the other,guess what I got My 4 week spray fishing walleyes,kinna cool,not quinty qunatity size but great big ones nonetheless Best of all I catch em short linning cranks  Actually Joey,you should get Tybo's fish posted just as a teaser
marc  i guess you go out to st pierre or st louis? ive seen people near my place catching the accidental walleye while perch fishing and some of them still have eggs/sperm, damn late spring

Well have a good season Marc .200 days without a day off thats a hell of long work week.  I hope you caught something in Papineau Labelle.  Here are some the Quality Walleye's caught during the kiwanis fishing tournament last weekend.    I saw many walleyes over 9lbs where we were staying .Not from me though I just caught a few good ones to eat.  Be safe out there.MTP. GOOD LUCK
Best of luck to you this season Marc and I'm lookin forward to seeing the fish that beats last years brutes.

Lew Oclock.I am up,off and ready for wet socks Yes Carl,I fish Louis,Boucherville and St Pierre for walleyes,I suspect this year fish might be late some.Every year there's always some late spawners Move around depending on the bites and guest Today is ME day  Yep Mike my love of my works starts tomorrow,gots a few days off here and there mostly in May and beginning of June then its of to the races till end October I like this time of year,wet socks bite well and some big ones too  Gotta go,My Reef Runners are calling me
